SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - On the diagram, put an X on the area that hurts the most.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Area that Hurts Most

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - On the diagram, shade in the areas where you feel pain.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Areas of Pain

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: BPI2-Pain at its Least in Last 24 Hours
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain at its least in the last 24 hours.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: BPI2-Pain at its Least in Last 24 Hours
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain at its Least in Last 24 Hours

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: BPI2-Pain at its Worst in Last 24 Hours
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain at its worst in the last 24 hours.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: BPI2-Pain at its Worst in Last 24 Hours
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain at its Worst in Last 24 Hours

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your enjoyment of life.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Enjoyment of Life

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your general activity.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with General Activity

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your walking ability.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Walking Ability

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your mood.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Mood

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your normal work.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Normal Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your relations with other people.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Relations

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your sleep.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Sleep

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain on the average.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain on the Average

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Have you had pain other than these everyday kinds of pain today?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain Other Than Everyday Kinds

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that tells how much pain you have right now.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Pain Right Now

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - In the last 24 hours, how much relief have pain treatments or medications provided? Please circle the one percentage that most shows how much relief you have received.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Relief from Pain Treatments Provided

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - What treatments or medications are you receiving for your pain?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BPI Short Form - Treatments or Medications Receiving for Pain
